name: ZuL
summary: A version of Rene Grothmann's open source dynamic geometry software.
short_description:
After using Rene Grothmann's dynamic geometry software ZuL (Zirkel und Lineal; English version CaR for Compass and Ruler) for a while, I realized that I'd be interested in developing it. Was originally to be named CaR, but this name was not available, so I used the German version ZuL.

With his permission I created this project, based initially on the source distribution on his site (http://car.rene-grothmann.de/doc_de/). English pages are available on Rene's site as well. 

Until any changes are made here, please refer to Rene's site for more information. Once any changes are made here, they will be described.
